name: RIDGID
0: ”Alexa ask RIDGID Pumps about my pump”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ridgid pumps
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Use this app to check the status and health of your RIDGID Smart Sump Pump. This skill will tell you

- Current Status
- When the pump last ran
- Fault - Refer to the app
- Today's Pump Activity
- Pump Health
